meanings.definition: A record or display of the electrical activity of the eye muscles.
meanings.sent1: The doctor showed me the electrooculogram of my eye muscles.
meanings.sent2: The researchers analyzed the electrooculogram to understand the eye muscle activity.
meanings.sent3: The electrooculogram of the eye muscles looked like a colorful graph.
meanings.sent4: Her eye movements were so erratic, it was as if her electrooculogram was dancing.
meanings.sent5: The vivid electrooculogram displayed the eye muscle activity clearly.

meanings.definition: A test used to measure eye movements by recording the electrical potential between the front and back of the eye.
meanings.sent1: During the check-up, the technician performed an electrooculogram to measure my eye movements.
meanings.sent2: The hospital used an electrooculogram to assess the electrical potential in my eyes.
meanings.sent3: The electrooculogram test to measure eye movements felt like a blink challenge.
meanings.sent4: As the electrooculogram captured the eye's electrical potential, it revealed hidden patterns.
meanings.sent5: The detailed electrooculogram accurately measured the eye movements.
